description.ko: 음파와 음향적 메아리를 시각적으로 탐구하며, 소리의 패턴을 빛과 기하학의 역동적인 건축적 풍경으로 변환합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of sonic waves and acoustic echoes, translating sound patterns into a dynamic architectural landscape of light and geometry.

prompt: Cinematic 3D visualization of sound waves, ECHO-0 aesthetic, intricate geometric patterns of glowing light, holographic frequencies rippling through a dark void, minimalist architecture, cyan and amber neon pulses, 8k resolution, mathematical beauty, crystalline structure of audio data.
